name: Super Radish Witch
description:
The Potato Knight has spellbound everyone in Produceland!

Under the influence of his cunning Starch Magic, everyone hid away Produceland's magic gems. Without the magic gems in place, the land's crops started to wither! All hope is not lost though. The Super Radish Witch happens to be impervious to the Potato Knight's magic, and she's out to save the day!

Can you help the Super Radish Witch get the gems back and save Produceland? Fifteen exciting levels await!
